summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 4.8°C) and outside temperature (down 3.5°C) and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.6 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in light levels (up 8026 lux) and cloud levels (up 287 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in light levels (up 15479 lux), cloud levels (up 1751 m), feels like temperature (up 6.7°C), and outside temperature (up 5.5°C) when compared to today.

Yesterday’s cloud levels showed a low of 765m and a peak of 2220m, averaging 978.9m; the week and month recorded warmer averages.

summary.summary: Inside; temperature should feel pleasantly mild. Outside; moderate and mild. Also, air will feel comfortable and balanced. A few light raindrops may fall, partial cloudiness with some periods of sun, and it’s dim outside. The weather may be change rapidly and become worse.
